excerpt: Genteel, intimate restaurant with a terrace plating elevated local cuisine, plus a robust wine list.
detail_description: Nestled in the heart of Corfu Town, Venetian Well is a charming and intimate restaurant offering an elevated dining experience. The restaurant's location next to the historic Venetian well adds to its allure, creating a romantic and atmospheric setting. With a menu that combines local flavors with Mediterranean influences, guests can savor gourmet twists on island specialties while enjoying the picturesque surroundings of Kremasti Square.
name: Venetian Well

detail_description: Etrusco is a renowned restaurant located in Kato Korakiana, Corfu. The establishment is part of the Botrini family restaurant, known for its inventive menu featuring Italian- and Greek-inspired dishes. Chef Ettore Botrini showcases his impeccable culinary skills with a touch of creativity, particularly in molecular gastronomy. The restaurant offers a variety of appetizers, starters, main courses, and desserts that are sure to tantalize your taste buds.
name: Etrusco

detail_description: Klimataria is a beloved seafood taverna located in the picturesque fishing village of Benitses in Corfu. With a history spanning over 30 years, this family-owned restaurant is known for its rustic charm and warm hospitality. The menu showcases traditional Corfiot dishes such as bourdeto, pastitsada, sofrito, and bianco, prepared with fresh local ingredients.
name: Klimataria

detail_description: Rex Restaurant, a beloved establishment in Corfu Town since 1932, offers a refined yet laid-back dining experience with a focus on Greek and Corfiot cuisine. Nestled near the iconic Liston promenade, this historic eatery has been catering to both locals and visitors for nearly a century. The classic and elegant interior features soft lighting and ample seating, creating an ideal setting for a peaceful meal with loved ones.
name: Rex Restaurant

detail_description: Nestled within the old fortress, Corfu Sailing Restaurant has been a popular dining spot since 2004, drawing both locals and tourists. Its prime location offers stunning views of the ocean, creating an exceptional dining experience. The restaurant is known for its Mediterranean and Greek cuisine, with a focus on seafood and fresh fish.
name: Corfu Sailing Restaurant

detail_description: Toula's Seaside is a renowned waterfront restaurant located in Agni Bay, on the northeast coast of the island. This family-run establishment offers a laid-back atmosphere and stunning views of the turquoise sea. Specializing in fresh seafood with Mediterranean flavors, it has been serving delectable dishes since 1981. The menu features super-fresh grilled snapper, shelled prawns, and traditional Corfiot specialties prepared by Mrs. Toula herself.
name: Toula's Seaside

excerpt: Regional dishes are served in this low-key eatery that features a leafy terrace & sea views.
detail_description: Avli Restaurant in Corfu offers a charming dining experience with its leafy terrace and sea views. The restaurant specializes in mezedes, allowing diners to share small dishes rather than ordering individual main courses. The proprietors, Vasilis and Christos, prioritize local ingredients and showcase inventive combinations such as pork fillet with a sauce made from locally grown kumquats.
name: Avli Restaurant Corfu
address: Alkiviadou Dari 3 Garitsa, Corfu Kerkyra 491 00, Greece

name: The White House Restaurant
address: Kalami Gimari Kalami Bay, Kerkira 490 83, Greece

excerpt: Unassuming restaurant/bar with views of the marina, serving typical Greek dishes, local wine & beer.
detail_description: Salto is a charming restaurant and bar located in the trendy part of Corfu's old town, Spilia. It offers stunning views of the marina and serves typical Greek dishes along with local wine and beer. The menu features traditional Mediterranean dishes made with pure ingredients from small producers all over Greece, giving them a modern twist. From octopus tempura to herb-encrusted rack of lamb, the cuisine at Salto is both creative and full of character.
name: Salto

detail_description: Pomo D'Oro Corfu is a charming restaurant located in historic Skaramanga square, run by head chef Aristotelis Megoulas. Despite not having formal culinary training, his passion for cooking led him to learn from restaurant kitchens in Bologna. His pan-Mediterranean fusion cuisine reflects his Greek and French heritage, as well as his time spent in Italy.
name: Pomo D'Oro Corfu

detail_description: En Plo is a charming restaurant located in the Faliraki area just outside Corfu old town, offering a stunning waterfront dining experience. Situated right on the quay, diners can enjoy clear blue waters and even take a swim from their table. The menu features an array of options including snacks, pizzas, mezedes, salads, and pastas.
name: En Plo
address: Πυλη Αγιου Νικολαου ΦΑΛΗΡΑΚΙ ΚΕΡΚΥΡΑ, Kerkira 491 00, Greece

detail_description: Taverna Elizabeth, located in the village of Doukades in northwest Corfu, is a beloved stone-built restaurant offering traditional Corfiot-style slow food. The verdant, shaded courtyard upstairs provides a charming dining setting with views over the village, while indoors, vintage ouzo and Metaxa bottles adorn the decor. Run by Elizabeth's granddaughter, this old-school spot serves emblematic dishes such as pastitsada, a rich tomato-based casserole traditionally reserved for Sunday family lunch.
name: Taverna Elizabeth

excerpt: Classic restaurant serving Italian staples such as pizza, pasta, fish & meat dishes, plus wine.
detail_description: Tavola Calda is a charming Italian restaurant located in Corfu's Old Town, offering a romantic ambiance and air-conditioned comfort. The menu features a variety of Italian specialties such as pasta, pizza, stews, risotto, and fine meats. Guests can also enjoy a selection of quality Italian wines to complement their meal. The restaurant has received high praise for its exceptional service and delicious food prepared by the talented chef Nino using fresh ingredients.
name: La Tavola Calda

detail_description: Trilogia Restaurant is situated in the stunning location of Kassiopi, Corfu, offering a sophisticated dining experience. The restaurant's menu predominantly features Greek cuisine and promises a fine dining experience. It is considered one of the top restaurants in Kassiopi, providing an ideal setting for visitors to savor delicious Greek dishes. With its prime location and focus on quality dining, Trilogia Restaurant stands out as a must-visit culinary destination in this beautiful area of Corfu.
name: Trilogia Restaurant

detail_description: Oliva Restaurant Gastronomy by the Sea is a charming dining spot located in Nissaki, Corfu. It offers a delightful experience with delicious food and friendly staff. The restaurant boasts stunning views of the sea, making it an ideal place to enjoy a meal. Visitors highly recommend this restaurant for its amazing culinary experience and beautiful ambiance by the sea.
name: Oliva

excerpt: Seafront bar built into the rock serving cocktails, beers & coffees amid a mellow ambiance.
detail_description: Nestled along the stunning coastline of Paleokastritsa, La Grotta Bar is a charming seafront establishment that has been delighting visitors since the 1960s. Built into the rock formations, this unique bar offers a mellow ambiance where you can unwind with refreshing cocktails, beers, and coffees. For those seeking adventure, La Grotta features a diving board that invites thrill-seekers to leap into the crystal-clear waters below.
name: La Grotta Bar

detail_description: Nestled within the stunning Liston arcade, which boasts a striking late 19th-century architecture, the Liston Gastrotheque is an elegant all-day café restaurant that perfectly captures the essence of Corfu Town. With its honey-beige interiors and charming framed artwork, it offers a cozy indoor atmosphere during cooler months. When the weather permits, guests can enjoy their meals under the beautiful arches reminiscent of rue de Rivoli, soaking in the vibrant ambiance.
name: Liston Gastrotheque

detail_description: Nestled in the hills west of Corfu Town, Ambelonas Corfu is a charming farm and wine estate that offers a unique experience for visitors. The restaurant celebrates the island's agricultural heritage by providing a farm-to-table dining experience, using ingredients grown on-site and locally sourced. Guests can enjoy cooking classes, shop for local products, or indulge in a spectacular farm-to-table dinner with dishes that reinvent traditional Greek cuisine.
name: Ambelonas Corfu/Vineyard & restaurant

detail_description: Boukari Spiros Karidis Restaurant is a must-visit in the tranquil village of Boukari. This fish taverna offers an authentic taste of Corfu with its famed bourdeto, a spicy fish casserole served steaming in its pot. Located by the beach and bus stop to Corfu Town, it provides a perfect setting for a delightful dining experience.
name: Boukari Spiros Karidis Restaurant

detail_description: Restaurant Anthos is a family-owned gem located in the heart of Corfu Town, offering a delightful selection of Mediterranean dishes and local specialties with a creative twist. The cozy atmosphere provides the perfect setting to savor their carefully crafted dishes made from the freshest ingredients. Be sure to leave room for their daily-made sweet treats. Despite its somewhat hidden location, it's always bustling with satisfied customers, so booking in advance is recommended.
name: Restaurant Anthos

detail_description: NAOK Azur - Corfu is a stunning bar-restaurant perched above Garitsa Bay, offering breathtaking views of the Old Fortress and a charming beach below. The venue features a romantic rooftop terrace perfect for enjoying refreshing coffee during the day and sophisticated drinks in the evening, all while soaking in Mediterranean vibes enhanced by mood lighting. Downstairs, an energetic atmosphere comes alive with DJs spinning electro-house music for a lively crowd until dawn breaks over the Ionian Sea.
name: NAOK Azur - Corfu

detail_description: Aegli is a long-established and casually elegant restaurant located on the Liston arcade in Corfu town. It offers both local and international dishes, including steamed mussels, salads, Greek classics like spicy bourdetto and braised lamb shanks in red wine. The restaurant provides a great dining experience with attentive service and delicious food.
name: Aegli
address: Kapodistriou, Liston - Eleftherias Ave 23, Kerkira 491 00, Greece

detail_description: Taverna Tripa, situated in the picturesque village of Kinopiastes, is a renowned family-run restaurant that has been serving traditional Corfiot dishes since 1936. The rustic interior adorned with historic photographs and old wine barrels creates a nostalgic atmosphere. Guests are treated to over 20 delectable Greek dishes, including starters, mains, and desserts. Live entertainment featuring authentic Greek dancers and music adds to the immersive experience.
name: Taverna Tripa

detail_description: La Cucina - Oenos-Crudo is a renowned restaurant known for its diverse international cuisine, with a focus on Italian dishes and handmade pasta. The menu also features Thai curries, a raw fish bar, unique interpretations of Corfiot staples, and nods to British cuisine.
name: La Cucina - Oenos-Crudo

detail_description: Rouvas Tavern is a popular lunch spot located in the heart of Corfu's commercial district, near San Rocco Square. It attracts locals, including civil servants and lawyers, who appreciate the chef's flavorful traditional dishes such as fried fish with garlic sauce, pastitsio, and rabbit stifado. The restaurant offers an expanded menu similar to some places in Athens but provides a genuine home-cooked food experience without touristy views.
name: Rouvas Tavern

detail_description: Roula Fish Taverna is a charming spot where you can savor the freshest catch of the day, including sea bream, mullet, sole, squid, or snapper. If seafood isn't your preference, they also offer steak or chicken filet. The taverna is a bit hidden but worth finding; just follow the signs after passing Kontokali Bay Hotel.
name: Roula Fish Taverna

detail_description: Tristrato cafe-bar is a charming and hospitable establishment in the countryside, with an excellent selection of Greek cuisine. The owners are very friendly, and it's like spending time with your grandfathers - you can enjoy the view from the main road while sipping on some cold water. Traffic is minimal here, so this is definitely a place where you can relax and enjoy the company of friends.
name: Tristrato cafe-bar

detail_description: Fish Taverna Gerekos is a well-known and long-standing fish restaurant that prides itself on serving fresh catches from the family's own boats. The menu varies daily based on the season, and the helpful staff can assist in making selections. Guests can enjoy marinated anchovies, clams, salads, and crisp white wine for a delightful meze experience. Located within walking distance of apartments, this restaurant offers a pleasant family atmosphere to savor delicious seafood specialties.
name: Fish Taverna Gerekos

detail_description: Flavor is a charming restaurant located just a short walk from the town, run by a talented mother-daughter team. The cozy atmosphere is enhanced by beautiful Italian music playing softly in the background, creating the perfect setting for intimate conversations. The attentive and sweet staff add to the overall experience. The menu offers generous portions of delicious food at reasonable prices, with thoughtful pairings of veggies that make each dish both healthy and tasty.
name: Flavor

excerpt: Beachfront locale serving snacks, grills & seafood specialties, plus cocktails & tasting menus.
detail_description: Akron Beach Bar in Paleokastritsa offers a unique beachfront experience with a touch of luxury. In addition to the usual beach bar offerings, it features a pool area for those who prefer poolside relaxation. The modern and classy establishment includes a beautiful restaurant serving delicious Mediterranean dishes made with high-quality ingredients. Visitors can also enjoy water sports and private mini tours to Paxos Antipaxos islands.
name: Akron Beach Bar

detail_description: Eucalyptus is a charming tavern in Corfu, owned by Kostas and Doranthi, offering a relaxed atmosphere and delicious cuisine influenced by the island's Venetian history. The restaurant is known for its regional dishes and picturesque location at the harbor of Agios Stefanos. While some visitors praise the impeccable service and recommend trying specialties like artichokes saganaki and fresh fish, others note that food quality can vary annually.
name: EUCALYPTUS

detail_description: Nestled along the stunning shores of Glyfada beach, Pazuzu is not just your average beach bar and restaurant; it’s a vibrant hub for sun-seekers and party enthusiasts alike. By day, you can unwind on plush sun loungers while sipping refreshing cocktails or savoring delectable dishes crafted by skilled chefs. As dusk approaches, the atmosphere transforms into an electrifying party scene with world-class DJs spinning captivating electronic and house music that gets everyone moving.
name: Pazuzu

excerpt: Standard restaurant with outdoor seating whipping up homestyle gyros, salads, seafood & meat dishes.
detail_description: Taverna Ninos is a traditional restaurant located in the city center of Corfu, offering outdoor seating and serving up homestyle gyros, salads, seafood, and meat dishes. The restaurant prides itself on providing authentic Corfiot flavors and traditional recipes made with fresh ingredients at affordable prices. It is known for its specialties such as sofrito and pastitsada. Despite being tucked away, it has a lively atmosphere and exudes a traditional old-school vibe.
name: Ninos

detail_description: Spianada is a must-visit destination in Greece, especially during Easter. It offers stunning ocean views and an opportunity to dine at the Corfu Sailing Club Restaurant or En Plo, both of which provide amazing food with generous portions at reasonable prices. Located just outside of Old Towne, it's easily accessible from the cruise port without the large crowds. Don't miss out on trying the delicious lamb kebab and sweet potato fries while enjoying the beautiful surroundings.
name: Spianada

detail_description: Boukari Beach Restaurant is a charming fish taverna located on the beautiful Boukari Beach in Corfu, Greece. The restaurant offers stunning views of the sea and sunset, creating a picturesque dining experience. Visitors can expect warm hospitality and positive vibes, making it a place they'd want to return to. The beach itself is known for its crystal clear waters and is perfect for activities like swimming and sunbathing.
name: Boukari Beach

detail_description: Lotza Café is a popular spot in Corfu, offering a wide variety of delicious food and drinks at affordable prices. The café is known for its amazing desserts, great coffee, and generous portions. With plenty of options for vegetarians, the menu includes items like waffles, Greek omelettes, brownies, fruit bowls, and pizza with excellent crust.
name: Lotza Café

detail_description: This family-run restaurant in Corfu offers an outstanding dining experience, boasting breathtaking beach views and a delectable menu that will satisfy even the heartiest appetite. The staff provides attentive service with a touch of Greek charm, offering excellent wine suggestions and meal recommendations. The restaurant has a vibrant atmosphere that complements its fantastic food perfectly. As the top-rated eatery on TripAdvisor, George & Elenas Taverna creates a laid-back and casual ambiance for both locals and travelers alike.
name: George and Elena's Taverna

detail_description: Located conveniently in the historic Corfu Old Town, Diporto is a charming and relaxed tavern that provides an ideal setting for a quick lunch or a leisurely dinner while exploring the beauty of this Greek paradise. With a diverse menu offering an array of options, guests can indulge in various culinary delights within a casual ambiance. This reasonably priced eatery presents an extensive selection ranging from delectable pasta dishes to freshly caught seafood treats, all complemented by traditional Greek cuisine.
name: Diporto

detail_description: Nestled in the charming streets of Old Town Corfu, Bizou Vegan Café & Antiques offers a delightful dining experience. Despite a sudden storm causing flooding, the staff displayed exceptional hospitality and continued to serve delicious food. The menu features delectable options such as Greek Dakos, Baked Cheese, and Mushroom Pancakes. Guests rave about the tofu scramble and the cozy atmosphere of the café's alleyway seating.
name: Bizou Café & Antiques

detail_description: Located in Corfu, σαγράδο is a restaurant that stands out for its extensive vegan and vegetarian menu options. Visitors rave about the flavorful vegan bao made with mushrooms and the beet and arugula salad. The tapas-style dishes are beautifully presented, making it an ideal spot for vegetarians. Guests appreciate the attentive service and recommend trying the house white wine.
name: σαγράδο

detail_description: Ta Kokoria, located in the heart of the old town of Corfu, offers a warm welcome and generous portions of delicious Greek cuisine. The restaurant is ideally situated near popular landmarks such as Liston and the bell tower of St. Spyridons church. With both indoor and outdoor seating, it provides a pleasant dining experience. Visitors have praised the food's freshness and ample servings, with particular recommendations for dishes like lamb cutlets and salads.
name: Ta Kokoria

detail_description: Da Giovanni Aglio e Olio is an Italian restaurant located in the heart of Corfu Town, offering authentic Neapolitan-inspired cuisine. Run by Giovani, a Naples-born restaurateur, the restaurant features popular dishes such as 'Cacciatore and Pesto' and 'Linguine with clams,' along with genuine Neapolitan pizzas.
name: Da Giovanni Aglio e Olio

detail_description: Akos Farm is a small, family-owned restaurant situated on the main road in Dassia. Like other establishments in the area, it offers pleasant outdoor seating and delectable cuisine. This charming eatery provides a fantastic dining experience with its amiable and attentive wait staff, reasonably priced menu of generous proportions, and exceptional dishes that rival the finest offerings on the island. The seafood, meat options, and local specialties are particularly outstanding.
name: Akos Farm Restaurant

detail_description: Last night, I decided to opt for a slightly more upscale dining experience with breathtaking views of the ocean at Ta Diktia. This establishment is conveniently located near several resorts and sits right on the beach. Their fully stocked bar serves up unique and enticing cocktails, while their menu boasts incredible culinary delights. Over the past two weeks, I have frequented this restaurant for lunch every day and enjoyed three evenings of delectable dinners.
name: Ta Diktia

detail_description: Nestled at the end of a path winding through a lush Corfiot olive grove, Fisherman's Cabin is a charming taverna offering an exquisite seafood dining experience. With a limited yet fresh menu featuring delicacies like lobster pasta and seafood meze, this cozy spot by the sea is perfect for discerning fish enthusiasts. The outdoor dining area provides an awe-inspiring ambiance, especially during sunset, with only 30 seats strategically spaced to offer an intimate and serene atmosphere.
name: Fisherman's Cabin

detail_description: Vitamins Taverna, a family-owned restaurant for over 30 years, is dedicated to showcasing the best of Corfu's locally grown produce. The name reflects its commitment to serving fresh and nutritious food. Situated on a hillside terrace with breathtaking sea views, it offers beautifully prepared Greek dishes. Known as one of the top tavernas along Corfu's northeast coast, Vitamins Taverna provides excellent quality food with magnificent ocean views from May to October.
name: Vitamins Taverna
